content: size approx 12 long depending on yarn and gauge difficulty beginner the mini wind spinner is a beginner-friendly pattern that works up quickly and is perfect for scraps to really help it spin hang it with string or a swivel hook i used a medium-weight acrylic yarn for this pattern to get more stiffness and durability for outdoor use if you want to hang this inside and aren t particularly worried about it spinning you can use whatever type of yarn and gauge that makes you happy i strung together crystal beads to attach to the bottom but you could add a tassel or anything else that may catch the light old chandelier crystals wire-wrapped stones sea glass you can really get creative
